trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> class represents a set of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: La classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> rappresenta un set di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> implements the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> implementa l'interfaccia <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.#ctor" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> class that represents the specified CMS/PKCS #7 recipient.
trans-unit.target: Istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> che rappresenta il destinatario CMS/PKCS #7 specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> class and adds the specified recipient.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient)" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> e aggiunge il destinatario specificato.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> enumeration that specifies the type of subject identifier.
trans-unit.target: Membro dell'enumerazione <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> che specifica il tipo dell'identificatore del soggetto.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> collection that contains the certificates that identify the recipients.
trans-unit.target: Insieme <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> che contiene i certificati che identificano i destinatari.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> class and adds recipients based on the specified subject identifier and set of certificates that identify the recipients.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection)" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> e aggiunge i destinatari in base all'identificatore del soggetto specificato e al set di certificati che identificano i destinatari.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> object that represents the recipient to add to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> che rappresenta il destinatario da aggiungere all'insieme <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Add(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient)" /> method adds a recipient to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Add(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient)" /> aggiunge un destinatario all'insieme <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: If the method succeeds, the method returns an <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the zero-based position where the recipient is to be inserted.
trans-unit.target: Se il metodo ha esito positivo, restituisce un valore <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> che rappresenta la posizione in base zero in cui deve essere inserito il destinatario.

trans-unit.source: If the method fails, it throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se il metodo non riesce, viene generata un'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="recipient" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="recipient" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection to an array.
trans-unit.target: Copia l'insieme <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> in una matrice.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Array" /> object to which the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection is to be copied.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Array" /> nel quale deve essere copiato l'insieme <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in <c>array</c> where the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection is copied.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero nel parametro <c>array</c> in cui viene copiata la raccolta <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" /> method copies the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection to an array.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" /> copia l'insieme <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> in una matrice.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is not large enough to hold the specified elements.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> non è abbastanza ampia per contenere gli elementi specificati.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> does not contain the proper number of dimensions.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> non contiene il numero di dimensioni appropriato.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is outside the range of elements in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> non rientra nell'intervallo di elementi in <paramref name="array" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> objects where the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection is to be copied.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> in cui deve essere copiato l'insieme <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index for the array of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> objects in <c>array</c> to which the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection is copied.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero per la matrice di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> nel parametro <c>array</c> nel quale viene copiata la raccolta <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.CopyTo(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient[],System.Int32)" /> method copies the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection to a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> array.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.CopyTo(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient[],System.Int32)" /> copia l'insieme <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> in una matrice <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is not large enough to hold the specified elements.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> non è abbastanza ampia per contenere gli elementi specificati.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> does not contain the proper number of dimensions.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> non contiene il numero di dimensioni appropriato.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is outside the range of elements in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> non rientra nell'intervallo di elementi in <paramref name="array" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Count" /> property retrieves the number of items in the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Count" /> recupera il numero di elementi nell'insieme <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Valore <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> che rappresenta il numero di elementi nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.GetEnumerator" /> method returns a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> object for the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.GetEnumerator" /> restituisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> per l'insieme <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> object that can be used to enumerate the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> che può essere utilizzato per enumerare l'insieme <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.IsSynchronized" /> property retrieves whether access to the collection is synchronized, or thread safe.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.IsSynchronized" /> specifica se l'accesso all'insieme è sincronizzato o thread safe.

trans-unit.source: This property always returns <see langword="false" />, which means that the collection is not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà restituisce sempre <see langword="false" />, che indica che l'insieme non è thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value of <see langword="false" />, which means that the collection is not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: Valore <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> di <see langword="false" />, che indica che l'insieme non è thread safe.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Valore <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> che rappresenta l'indice nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: The index is zero based.
trans-unit.target: L'indice è in base zero.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Item(System.Int32)" /> property retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> object at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Item(System.Int32)" /> recupera l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The value of an argument was outside the allowable range of values as defined by the called method.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di un argomento non era compreso nell'intervallo di valori consentito, come definito dal metodo chiamato.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> object that represents the recipient to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> che rappresenta il destinatario da rimuovere dall'insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Remove(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient)" /> method removes a recipient from the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Remove(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient)" /> rimuove un destinatario dall'insieme <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="recipient" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="recipient" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.SyncRoot" /> property retrieves an <see cref="T:System.Object" /> object used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.SyncRoot" /> recupera un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso all'insieme <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> object that is used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso all'insieme <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.System#Collections#IEnumerable#GetEnumerator" /> method returns a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> object for the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.System#Collections#IEnumerable#GetEnumerator" /> restituisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> per l'insieme <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> object that can be used to enumerate the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> che può essere utilizzato per enumerare l'insieme <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.
